response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to the market value of $1,500,000, making it a highly attractive opportunity for you. We understand the importance of maximizing your investment, and this offer is designed to ensure that you receive the best possible return on your expenditure. Should you choose to accept this offer, we are committed to providing unparalleled customer service and support throughout the entire process. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
